title: Emerald Swarna Kankanam: Exquisite Gold & Diamond Bangle
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricate filigree work featuring delicate floral and vine patterns, embellished with sparkling diamonds. The centerpiece is a captivating square-cut emerald set in a diamond halo. Inspired by traditional South Indian motifs with a contemporary open cuff design.
occasions: and sophisticated evening events. Can also be worn as a statement piece to elevate a contemporary outfit.
description: This bangle showcases exceptional craftsmanship and a harmonious blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. The emerald, a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, is meticulously set to capture light and create a captivating sparkle. A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage.
